titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of September 4, 2020, as "National Polycystic Kidney Disease Awareness Day", and raising awareness and understanding of polycystic kidney disease.
Expressing support for the designation of September 4, 2020, as "National Polycystic Kidney Disease Awareness Day", and raising awareness and understanding of polycystic kidney disease.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National Polycystic Kidney Disease Awareness Day and recognizes the need for additional research to find a cure.
